name: itsourcecode Monbela Tourist Inn Online Reservation System SQL注入漏洞
product: ["itsourcecode Monbela Tourist Inn Online Reservation System 1.0"]
description: Monbela Tourist Inn Online Reservation System是itsourcecode开源的一款使用PHP开发的旅游酒店在线预订系统，用于存储和检索数据或进行的任何交易。itsourcecode Monbela Tourist Inn Online Reservation System login.php存在SQL注入漏洞，攻击者可利用漏洞获取数据库敏感信息。
solution: 厂商尚未提供漏洞修复方案，请关注厂商主页更新：https://itsourcecode.com/free-projects/php-project/monbela-tourist-inn-online-reservation-system/
